Class LoginProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • login.LoginProcessor

  • public class LoginProcessor
extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean createSessionCookie()
      Asks the web server to create a session for the User that is logging in.
      boolean login()
      Returns a boolean value indicating whether the server accepts the createSessionCookie() method and the User login credentials are verified against the DB.
      boolean resetPassword(java.lang.String password, java.lang.String newPassword)
      Sends a request to the DB adapter to change the current User’s password (which is verified first) to a new one.

    • Method Detail

      • login

        public boolean login()
        Returns a boolean value indicating whether the server accepts the createSessionCookie() method and the User login credentials are verified against the DB.
        Parameters:
        none -
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if the User has been logged in

      • createSessionCookie

        public boolean createSessionCookie()
        Asks the web server to create a session for the User that is logging in. Returns a boolean indicating if it ended up being created.
        Parameters:
        none -
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if the session is created

      • resetPassword

        public boolean resetPassword(java.lang.String password,
                             java.lang.String newPassword)
        Sends a request to the DB adapter to change the current User’s password (which is verified first) to a new one. Returns a boolean value indicating if it passes.
        Parameters:
        password - A String to be checked against the DB record for the password of the User
        newPassword - A String to be sent to the DB to be stored as the new password for the User.
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if the password is reset
